name: Silent Hill: The Arcade
storyline: November, 1918, Toluca Lake, Central Silent Hill. Sightseeing boat, the Little Baroness mysteriously disappears with 14 crew members and passengers on board. 75 years later the ship returns to Silent Hill. A group of young people is coming to Silent Hill at this time. Eric, a young man with deep connections to the Little Baroness. Tina, classmate of Eric whose purpose is to visit a young friend Emilie who lives in Silent Hill with her father Frank. Nightmare for 75 years revives from the bottom of the lake.
summary:
Silent Hill: The Arcade is an arcade game based on Silent Hill survival horror series by Konami. The Arcade has currently never been officially ported to consoles or on PC, thus the game is rare. However, in February 2014, it was unofficially ported to PC (Windows XP & 7) by a group of talented fans known as Insert More Coins (more details here), although setting up the game may be difficult as it can only run on monitors that support 640x480 resolution and is apparently not Windows 10-compatible.

On Sept 2015, another fan known as Biffman 101 re-published the port on their blog and following a conversation with an anonymous commenter, in 2019, a Windows 10 compatible version was emerged and published, on their blog post (The Collection Chamber - SILENT HILL: THE ARCADE).
